Description:
We are seeking a dedicated Operations Supervisor to join our team and help ensure the smooth functioning of our operations.Responsibilities:As an Operations Supervisor at Alrashed Tires Company, you will be responsible for the following:Coordinating day-to-day operations activities to ensure efficiency.

Monitoring the progress of our technicians and ensuring the timely completion of tasks.
Providing support by assigning new technicians when needed.
Managing equipment resources effectively.
Managing the cost.
Collaborating with the production manager to verify inventory levels.
Handling invoicing and efficiently closing orders.Skills

Bachelor's degree.
Saudi National.
Two years or more of relevant experience.
Experience in the automotive or car-related industry.

Strong time management, prioritization, and multitasking skills.
